    [e][h]Version 7.22
    Version Information
    Release Date:
    2019-05-24
    Highlights
    • All heroes now have Aghanim's Scepter upgrades
    • Mars & Io added to Captains Mode
    • Balance Changes
    Chronology
     
     V7.21d
    V7.22b

    General[edit]

    Scepter Upgrades[edit]

    • Added new Aghanim's Scepter upgrades for all of the 24 remaining heroes without an upgrade
    • Updated various older Scepter upgrades
    • Scepter can now be consumed as a buff by purchasing a 2000 gold recipe upgrade
      • Scepter buffs do not grant secondary stat bonuses
    • Added a new visual effect under heroes that have a Scepter upgrade

    Roshan[edit]

    • Roshan now drops a consumable Scepter buff item
      • The third Roshan will randomly drop either a consumable Scepter item or a Refresher Shard
      • The fourth Roshan has both
      • You can select Roshan to see his inventory and find out what items will drop
    • Base armor increased by 2
    • Attack damage per minute increased from 4 to 6
    • Last hit gold bounty range changed from 150-400 to 225-325 (average unchanged)
    • Last hit XP bounty reduced from 750 to 400

    Captains Mode[edit]

    • Added Mars to Captains Mode
    • Added Io to Captains Mode

    Death[edit]

    • The timer that credits a player for a kill, when radiant/dire get the final hit, is increased from 20 to 30 seconds
    • Deny XP granted to the enemy (the player being denied) increased from 35% to 40%
    • Death cost changed from 50 + NW/40 to NW/40

    Experience[edit]

    • Killstreak XP bounty increased from 200➜1250 to 400➜1800
    • XP requirement to reach level 5/6 reduced from 600/620 to 580/600
    • XP required to reach level 19+ increased by 100 each level
    • Ranged creeps XP now increases by 8 per upgrade cycle (every 7.5 minutes)

    Siege Creeps[edit]

    • Siege creeps base attack time increased from 2.7 to 3
    • Siege creeps now spawn two units at 35 minutes instead of 30 minutes
    • Siege creeps can no longer be dominated, enchanted, or converted

    Towers[edit]

    • Tier 3+ towers damage increased from 152 damage to 175
    • Tier 1 Tower Protection aura armor bonus increased from 2 to 3
    • Tier 2+ Tower Protection aura armor bonus increased from 4 to 5
    • Tier 2+ Towers now have a multishot attack when glyph is activated
      • Attacks up to two additional targets
      • Prioritizes the closest units

    Map Changes[edit]

    • Slightly adjusted Radiant safelane hard camp position and the terrain nearby
    • Reduced the chase duration of the hard camp neutrals on the radiant safelane area
    • Radiant middle tier 2 tower is now moved further to the left
      • (No longer has vision over the big camp on the right)
    • Adjusted tree line to the right of the radiant middle tier 2 tower
    • The Radiant mid lane medium camp now has 2 layers of trees behind it
    • Adjusted various Dire neutral spawn boxes

    Lifesteal[edit]

    • Illusions can now lifesteal
    • Lifesteal now works against enemy illusions
      • (Calculated before illusion amplification)

    Item Sharing[edit]

    • The following items are no longer partially shareable:
      • Ring of Regen
      • Ring of Tarrasque
      • Sage's Mask
      • Ring of Health
      • Void Stone
      • Perseverance

    Neutrals[edit]

    • Satyr Tormenter Unholy Aura hp regen reduced from 5.5 to 5

    Base Attack Speed[edit]

    • Heroes can now have non-standard initial attack speed values (previously 100 for all heroes)
      • Abaddon: Base attack speed increased from 100 to 115
      • Broodmother: Base attack speed increased from 100 to 125
      • Crystal Maiden: Base attack speed increased from 100 to 115
      • Gyrocopter: Base attack speed increased from 100 to 125
      • Mirana: Base attack speed increased from 100 to 115
      • Silencer: Base attack speed increased from 100 to 115
      • Slark: Base attack speed increased from 100 to 120
      • Venomancer: Base attack speed increased from 100 to 115
      • Weaver: Base attack speed increased from 100 to 120

    Base Mana Region[edit]

    • Heroes can now have non-standard base mana regen values
      • Clinkz: Now has 0.25 base mana regen
      • Lich: Now has 0.75 base mana regen
      • Pugna: Now has 0.5 base mana regen
      • Shadow Fiend: Now has 0.3 mana regen
      • Techies: Now has 1 base mana regen
      • Tinker: Now has 0.25 base mana regen
      • Treant Protector: Now has 0.5 base mana regen
      • Weaver: Now has 0.4 base mana regen
      • Zeus: Now has 0.25 base mana regen

    Items[edit]

    Bloodstone[edit]

    • Fixed multiple Bloodstones stacking the mana regen amplification effect

    Drum of Endurance[edit]

    • Mana regen reduced from 1.5 to 1.25

    Eye of Skadi[edit]

    • Slow duration changed from 5/2.5 for melee/range attackers to 3 seconds
    • Slow amount reduced from 35% to 20% when used against melee heroes
    • Slow amount increased from 35% to 45% when used against ranged heroes
    • Attack speed slow now matches the movement slow values above

    Guardian Greaves[edit]

    • HP regen aura reduced from 4.5 to 3.5
    • Threshold bonus armor reduced from 15 to 10

    Helm of The Dominator[edit]

    • Now has a 300 gold recipe

    Mask of Madness[edit]

    • Movement speed bonus increased from 25 to 30

    Mekansm[edit]

    • HP regen aura reduced from 4.5 to 3.5

    Observer Ward[edit]

    • Cost decreased from 75 to 50
    • Gold bounty increased from 100 + 2/min to 100 + 4/min
    • XP bounty increased from 50 + 4/min to 50 + 6/min

    Pipe of Insight[edit]

    • HP regen aura reduced from 3 to 2

    Rod of Atos[edit]

    • Strength and agility reduced from 12 to 10

    Sentry Ward[edit]

    • Cost decreased from 100 to 75
    • Now have a stock limit (max limit of 10, starting capacity of 4, replenish rate of 70 seconds)

    Spirit Vessel[edit]

    • Heal reduction reduced from 70% to 60%
    • Current health as damage per second reduced from 5% to 4%

    Tome of Knowledge[edit]

    • The initial 10 minute stock now provides 2 tomes
    • Now has a 5 minute use cooldown

    Vladmir's Offering[edit]

    • Mana regen reduced from 1.75 to 1.5

    Wraith Band[edit]

    • Attack speed bonus reduced from 6 to 5

    Heroes[edit]

    Abaddon[edit]

    • Base attack speed increased from 100 to 115
    • Reworked Scepter upgrade
      • While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than 525 damage while within 1600 range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally
      • (Scepter still increases duration by 1)
    • Mist Coil cast range reduced from 800 to 500
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +75 Mist Coil Heal/Damage to +60

    Alchemist[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • With Scepter equipped or synthesized, you gain a bonus +30 Damage and +6% Spell Amp for each Scepter that you gave allies at any point in the game

    Ancient Apparition[edit]

    • Ice Vortex mana cost reduced from 50/70/90/110 to 40/60/80/100
    • Ice Blast can no longer been seen on the minimap by enemies if they have true sight

    Anti-Mage[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Mana Void kills now add +70 seconds to the highest cooldown ability on the enemy hero
      • Cooldown starts once the enemy respawns
      • Increases the stun duration by 1 second, if the target dies during this period it is still counted as a Mana Void kill

    Arc Warden[edit]

    • Turn rate improved from 0.6 to 0.7
    • Fixed Tempest Double being unable to activate runes
    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Grants a new ability, Rune Forge
      • Creates a random Rune in front of you
      • Cooldown: 60
      • Mana Cost: 100
      • The selection of Runes include Bounty Runes and Powerup Runes
    • Level 10 Talent increased from +30 Attack Speed to +35
    • Level 20 Talent increased from -1.5 Spark Wraith Cooldown to -2

    Axe[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 3
    • Base armor increased by 1
    • Reworked Scepter upgrade
      • Now causes Battle Hunger to be a 400 AoE target ability
      • (Debuff still reduces enemy damage by 30%)
    • Battle Hunger gives half speed when used on creeps

    Bane[edit]

    • Brain Sap Scepter now also reduces cast point by 50%
    • Level 20 Talent increased from +100 Enfeeble Attack Speed Reduction to +125

    Batrider[edit]

    • Firefly cooldown from 34 to 40/38/36/34
    • Flaming Lasso Scepter secondary search radius increased from 400 to 450

    Beastmaster[edit]

    • Reworked Scepter upgrade
      • Wild Axes have no cooldown and can be used again once they have returned to Beastmaster
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +65 Wild Axes Damage to 40 Boar Attack Damage
    • Level 20 Talent changed from +50 Boar Attack Damage to +75 Wild Axes Damage

    Bloodseeker[edit]

    • Agility gain reduced from 3.5 to 3.1
    • Blood Rite mana cost reduced from 100 to 70/80/90/100
    • Rupture is now lethal again
      • Deals 30/45/60% of distance moved as damage
      • Has 8/10/12 second duration

    Bounty Hunter[edit]

    • Jinada damage reduced from 80/110/140/170 to 70/100/130/160
    • Shuriken Toss Scepter now also increases cast range from 400 to 800
    • Level 20 Talent increased from +75 Shuriken Toss Damage to +125

    Brewmaster[edit]

    • Thunder Clap damage reduced from 100/175/250/300 to 90/160/230/300
    • Primal Split Scepter now also grants Brewlings +100 movement speed

    Bristleback[edit]

    • Base armor increased by 1
    • Warpath damage per stack increased from 18/24/30 to 22/28/34
    • Viscous Nasal Goo Scepter AoE increased from 750 to 825

    Broodmother[edit]

    • Base attack speed increased from 100 to 125
    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Increases Spin Web max count from 8 to 20, movement speed bonus from 70% to 100%, and removes movement speed limit

    Centaur Warrunner[edit]

    • Base armor increased by 1
    • Level 20 Talent increased from +70 Retaliate Damage to +80

    Chaos Knight[edit]

    • Strength gain reduced from 3.7 to 3.4
    • Chaos Bolt minimum damage increased from 60/90/120/150 to 90/110/130/150
    • Chaos Bolt maximum damage increased from 180/210/240/270 to 180/220/260/300
    • Chaos Bolt minimum stun changed from 1/1/1/2 to 1.25/1.5/1.75/2
    • Chaos Bolt maximum stun changed from 2/3/4/4 to 2.2/2.8/3.4/4
    • Chaos Bolt cooldown increased from 10 to 13/12/11/10
    • Phantasm Scepter now also reduces incoming illusion damage from 260% to 180%

    Chen[edit]

    • Holy Persuasion provides +10/15/20/25 bonus movement speed to converted creeps
    • Divine Favor is now a passive aura
      • Provides 1/2/3/4 HP regen, 8/12/16/20% Heal Amplification, and 4/8/12/16 bonus damage for heroes (Creeps get 2× damage values)
    • Level 15 Talent changed from -7 Divine Favor Cooldown to +10 Divine Favor Damage

    Clinkz[edit]

    • Now has 0.25 base mana regen
    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Creates two skeletons near Clinkz when exiting Wind Walk
      • Increases Wind Walk speed by +30% and unlocks max movement speed
    • Burning Army base attack time changed from 1.75/1.6/1.45 to 1.6
    • Burning Army units damage from 100% of your base damage to 80/100/120%
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +30 Searing Arrows Damage to +20

    Clockwerk[edit]

    • Base armor increased by 1

    Crystal Maiden[edit]

    • Attack point improved from 0.55 to 0.45
    • Base attack speed increased from 100 to 115

    Dark Seer[edit]

    • Strength reduced from 24 to 21
    • Level 20 Talent changed from 400 AoE Surge to +100 Ion Shell Damage
    • Level 20 Talent changed from +15% Cooldown Reduction to +10 Armor
    • Level 25 Talent changed from +150 Ion Shell Damage to 400 AoE Surge

    Dark Willow[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Attacking no longer takes you out of Shadow Realm
      • Each attack still has bonus damage based on the duration of the buff
    • Level 15 Talent increased from +90 Gold/Min to +120
    • Level 20 Talent changed from +300 Shadow Realm Max Damage to -12s Bramble Maze Cooldown

    Dazzle[edit]

    • Shallow Grave Scepter radius increased from 450 to 500

    Death Prophet[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Anytime an enemy is effected by your spells (carrion swarm impact, silence debuff, spirit siphon target) or when you attack an enemy, a ghost will fly out and hit the enemy for double the usual damage then return to you with life
      • These ghosts apply a 100% slow for 0.3 seconds
    • Crypt Swarm cast point reduced from 0.5 to 0.4

    Disruptor[edit]

    • Level 15 Talent increased from -3 Kinetic Field Cooldown to -4

    Doom[edit]

    • Devour now has a creep level limit of 3/4/5/6
    • Level 25 Talent increased from +130% Cleave to +175%

    Dragon Knight[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Adds a 4th level to Elder Dragon Form, a Black Dragon
      • Gaining Scepter increases the level of your ultimate by one
      • Black Dragon has 50% more Corrosive Damage, Splash Damage, and Slow amount
      • It also increases your attack range to 600 and grants you +30% Magic Resistance

    Drow Ranger[edit]

    • Marksmanship no longer instantly kills Ancients (still does damage/pierces)
    • Marksmanship now only pierces base armor not total armor

    Elder Titan[edit]

    • Reworked Scepter upgrade
      • Echo Stomp now causes you to become Spell Immune while channeling and for 2 additional seconds per affected enemy hero

    Ember Spirit[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Fire Remnant cast range is 3 times longer and initial remnant movement speed is 2 times faster
      • Maximum number of charges increased from 3 to 5
      • Activate Fire Remnant costs no mana

    Faceless Void[edit]

    • Strength gain increased from 2.1 to 2.4
    • Level 10 Talent improved from +10 Strength to +12
    • Level 15 Talent improved from -1 Time Walk Cooldown to -1.5
    • Level 20 Talent improved from +40 Attack Speed to +45

    Grimstroke[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Grants you a new ability, Dark Portrait
      • Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero
      • Illusion lasts 20 seconds and is magic immune with +30% movement speed
      • Takes 200% incoming damage and deals 150% outgoing damage
      • Cooldown: 35
      • Mana Cost: 200
    • Ink Swell is now castable on allied Spell Immune units

    Gyrocopter[edit]

    • Base attack speed increased from 100 to 125

    Huskar[edit]

    • Base armor increased by 1
    • Berserker's Blood regen increased from 20/40/60/80 to 25/45/65/85%
    • Inner Fire cooldown reduced from 18/16/14/12 to 14/13/12/11

    Invoker[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 3
    • Exort attack damage per instance reduced from 3/7/11/15/19/23/27 to 2/6/10/14/18/22/26
    • Level 10 Talent increased from +30 Chaos Meteor Contact Damage to +40
    • Level 20 Talent increased from +35 Alacrity Damage/Speed to +45

    Io[edit]

    • Added to Captains Mode
    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Spirits now passively spawn around you constantly every second (max of 5 spirits at a given time)
    • Tether pull can now be interrupted if stunned during it (like Timber Chain)

    Jakiro[edit]

    • Liquid Fire ability effect still impacts the area when the target dies or the attack is evaded

    Keeper of the Light[edit]

    • Scepter now also causes Illuminate to not require channeling (still provides heal bonus)
    • Chakra Magic can now be cast on enemies, placing a debuff that drains 4/4.5/5/5.5% of current mana per 100 units moved
      • Lasts 5 seconds
      • (Old version was a percent of max mana, not current)

    Legion Commander[edit]

    • Base armor increased by 1

    Lich[edit]

    • Now has 0.75 base mana regen

    Lina[edit]

    • Strength gain increased from 2 to 2.2
    • Turn rate improved from 0.5 to 0.6

    Lion[edit]

    • Finger of Death damage per kill reduced from 50 to 40

    Lone Druid[edit]

    • Strength gain increased from 2.4 to 2.7
    • True Form health bonus increased from 300/600/900 to 300/700/1100

    Luna[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 4

    Lycan[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Causes one of the three creep waves to include two wolves
      • You cannot control the wolves, but they are considered your units
      • These wolves have the same movement speed as lane creeps
    • Level 15 Talent increased from +8 Feral HP Regen to +10

    Magnus[edit]

    • Starting strength increased by 2
    • Shockwave Scepter max range increased from 1725 to 2000
    • Shockwave Scepter speed increased from 1200 to 1500

    Mars[edit]

    • Added to Captains Mode
    • Base damage reduced by 4
    • Base armor reduced by 1
    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • God's Rebuke cooldown is now 1.4 seconds during Arena of Blood
      • Resets God's Rebuke cooldown when Arena of Blood is cast
    • Arena of Blood damage rescaled from 150/200/250 to 120/185/250
    • Arena of Blood cast point increased from 0.1 to 0.2
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +35 Damage to +30

    Medusa[edit]

    • Agility gain reduced from 3.9 to 3.6
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +30% Mystic Snake Mana Steal to +25%

    Meepo[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 2
    • Level 10 Talent increased from +7 Strength to +10
    • Level 10 Talent increased from +10 Damage to +15
    • Level 15 Talent increased from +15% Evasion to +20%

    Mirana[edit]

    • Attack point increased from 0.3 to 0.35
    • Base attack speed increased from 100 to 115
    • Starstorm Scepter upgrade trigger rate improved from 10 seconds to 9

    Monkey King[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Spawns a monkey soldier near you every 3.5 seconds
      • These soldiers last 12 seconds
      • Soldiers do not spawn if you are invisible or on trees
      • These soldiers can attack any target (however, they will not attack buildings if you are not within 500 range of them)

    Morphling[edit]

    • Adaptive Strike damage reduced from 100 to 70/80/90/100
    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • While Morphed, you gain +35% cooldown reduction, +50% mana cost reduction and +600 cast range
    • Morph no longer dispels your hero

    Nature's Prophet[edit]

    • Base damage reduced by 2
    • Nature's Call attack damage reduced from 27/30/33/36 to 24/28/32/36

    Necrophos[edit]

    • Reaper's Scythe respawn time reduced from 15/30/45 to 15/25/35

    Night Stalker[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Void is now applied in a 900 AoE around you
      • Increases the Void ministun duration from 0.1 to 0.6
      • Reduces cooldown by 2 seconds

    Nyx Assassin[edit]

    • Base strength reduced by 1
    • Vendetta cooldown rescaled from 70/60/50 to 90/70/50
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +30 Movement Speed to +25

    Ogre Magi[edit]

    • Multicast 2× cast chance increased from 70% to 75%
    • Level 25 Talent increased from +275 Fireblast Damage to +300

    Omniknight[edit]

    • Guardian Angel Scepter now also provides +40 HP/sec regen (affects buildings still)

    Oracle[edit]

    • Base attack time increased from 1.4 to 1.7
    • Level 20 Talent reduced from +50 Movement Speed to +45

    Outworld Devourer[edit]

    • Equilibrium now passively provides 11/18/25/32% Mana Steal (all damage not just spells)
      • When Activated, triples the Mana Steal and slows enemies hit by your spells

    Pangolier[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Shield Crash now casts a 2-attack Swashbuckle every 90 degrees around your hero
    • Lucky Shot no longer has a chance to silence, now always disarms
    • Lucky Shot now reduces armor by 3/4/5/6

    Phantom Assassin[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Blur now has instant cast time and applies a dispel
      • Anytime you get a hero kill, your abilities are refreshed
      • Reduces Blur cooldown to 12 seconds

    Phantom Lancer[edit]

    • Strength gain increased from 2 to 2.2
    • Agility gain increased from 3 to 3.2

    Phoenix[edit]

    • Base strength increased by 2
    • Supernova now causes your abilities to refresh on cast, rather than at the end of the spell
    • Supernova Scepter now also allows you to cast Sun Ray and turn its direction while in Supernova

    Puck[edit]

    • Intelligence gain increased from 3.1 to 3.5
    • Strength gain increased from 2.2 to 2.4

    Pudge[edit]

    • Base intelligence increased by 2
    • Level 15 Talent increased from +12% Rot Slow to +16%

    Pugna[edit]

    • Now has 0.5 base mana regen
    • Agility gain increased from 1 to 1.3
    • Nether Ward mana loss increased from 0.25/0.5/0.75/1 to 0.3/0.6/0.9/1.2

    Razor[edit]

    • Eye of the Storm Scepter no longer increases attack rate
    • Eye of the Storm Scepter now hits up to two different units strike instead of one (still affects buildings)

    Riki[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 3

    Rubick[edit]

    • Agility gain increased from 19 + 2.1 to 23 + 2.5

    Shadow Demon[edit]

    • Intelligence gain increased from 3.1 to 3.3

    Shadow Fiend[edit]

    • Now has 0.3 mana regen
    • Strength gain increased from 2.3 to 2.5
    • Agility gain increased from 3.3 to 3.5

    Shadow Shaman[edit]

    • Ether Shock mana cost rescaled from 95/105/135/160 to 100/120/140/160

    Silencer[edit]

    • Base attack speed increased from 100 to 115

    Skywrath Mage[edit]

    • Ancient Seal cast range increased from 700 to 750
    • Concussive Shot mana cost from 95 to 80/85/90/95

    Slardar[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Slithereen Crush now creates a puddle of water that is considered a river for bonuses
      • Provides +25 HP regen, +12 Armor and +40% Status Resistance while in a Puddle or River (in addition to the normal Guardian Sprint River bonuses)
      • Puddle AoE is 550
      • Puddles last for 25 seconds
    • Guardian Sprint now passively provides an extra 5/20/35/50% movement boost in the river with unlocked max speed, rather than a fixed 700 at level 4 when activated
    • Level 25 Talent changed from +1.25s Slithereen Crush Stun to -4.5 Slithereen Crush Cooldown

    Slark[edit]

    • Base attack speed increased from 100 to 120
    • Shadow Dance passive health regen rescaled from 3/5/7% to 5/6/7%
    • Shadow Dance Scepter range increased from 325 to 425

    Spectre[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Grants you a new ability, Shadow Step
      • Allows you to perform a single target unit Haunt
      • Cooldown: 70
      • Mana Cost: 180

    Spirit Breaker[edit]

    • Base health regen increased from 0.75 to 1.25
    • Bulldoze status resistance increased from 30/40/50/60 to 34/46/58/70%
    • Bulldoze movement speed increased from 12/18/24/30% to 14/20/26/32%
    • Greater Bash stun duration rescaled from 1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8 to 0.9/1.2/1.5/1.8
    • Greater Bash damage rescaled from 8/16/24/32% to 14/20/26/32%
    • Charge of Darkness mana cost reduced from 100 to 70/80/90/100
    • Nether Strike Scepter cast range increased from 850 to 950
    • Nether Strike Scepter radius increased from 250 to 350

    Techies[edit]

    • Now has 1 base mana regen

    Templar Assassin[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Grants you a new ability, Psionic Projection
      • Allows you to teleport to any Psionic Trap after a 2 second channel
      • Does not break Meld
      • Cooldown: 30
      • Mana Cost: 100
      • Detonates the psionic trap on arrival

    Terrorblade[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • After casting Metamorphosis, a wave travels outwards in all directions causing enemy heroes to become feared for 3 seconds upon impact
      • Wave starts traveling 0.6 seconds and has a travel speed of 1000
      • Spell Immune units do not get hit by the wave
      • Has a global sound effect
    • Reflection no longer affects illusions

    Tidehunter[edit]

    • Gush Scepter upgrade radius increased from 240 to 260
    • Gush Scepter upgrade distance increased from 1800 to 2200

    Timbersaw[edit]

    • Strength growth increased from 2.8 to 3.2
    • Intelligence gain increased from 2.4 to 2.7
    • Base armor increased by 1
    • Level 10 Talent changed from +6% Spell Amplification to +2.5 Mana Regen
    • Level 10 Talent changed from +25% XP Gain to +225 Health
    • Level 15 Talent increased from +5 Reactive Armor Stacks to +8
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +100 Damage to +10% Spell Amplification
    • Level 20 Talent increased from +15 Strength to +20

    Tinker[edit]

    • Now has 0.25 base mana regen
    • Intelligence gain increased from 2.5 to 3.3
    • Level 10 Talent increased from +6% Spell Amplification to +8%
    • Level 10 Talent increased from +75 Cast Range to +100

    Tiny[edit]

    • Intelligence gain increased from 1.6 to 2.2
    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Grants you a new channeling ability, Tree Volley
      • Every 0.4 seconds a random tree within 525 range of your hero will be thrown towards the targeted AoE
      • Deals 120% of your damage to enemies in that area
      • Target AoE: 400
      • Cast Range: 1300
      • Max Channel: 2.4 seconds
      • Cooldown: 12
      • Mana Cost: 150
    • Tree Grab cooldown reduced from 27/22/17/12 to 25/20/15/10
    • Grow armor increased from 7/16/25 to 10/18/26

    Treant Protector[edit]

    • Now has 0.5 base mana regen
    • Nature's Guise has been reworked
      • It is now a self cast ability with a 0.6 second cast time
      • No longer has a fade delay nor gets interrupted on damage taken
      • Goes on cooldown after the invisibility buff ends
      • Cooldown: 10/8/6/4
      • Mana Cost: 30/40/50/60
    • Nature's Guise movement speed bonus rescaled from 14/18/22/26% to 20/22/24/26%
    • Nature's Guise damage rescaled from 30/90/150/210 to 60/110/160/210

    Troll Warlord[edit]

    • Added Scepter upgrade
      • Reduces Battle Trance cooldown to 35 seconds and allows it to be cast on allied or enemy heroes
      • Lasts half duration on enemies
      • Cast Range: 525

    Tusk[edit]

    • Level 20 Talent changed from +300 Snowball Speed to -6 Ice Shards Cooldown
    • Level 25 Talent changed from -6 Ice Shards Cooldown to -7 Snowball Cooldown
    • Level 25 Talent increased from 12% Chance Walrus Punch to 15% (now uses pseudo-random chance)

    Underlord[edit]

    • Pit of Malice radius increased from 375 to 390
    • Pit of Malice cooldown reduced from 32/28/24/20 to 30/26/22/18

    Undying[edit]

    • Soul Rip cast point improved from 0.45 to 0.35
    • Tombstone zombies now treat illusions like creeps, requiring 2 hits to kill rather than 1
    • Tombstone takes 1/4 damage from creeps/illusions rather than 1/2

    Vengeful Spirit[edit]

    • Nether Swap now has a 0.25 second cooldown to prevent accidental uses

    Venomancer[edit]

    • Base intelligence increased by 2
    • Base attack speed increased from 100 to 115
    • Level 15 Talent increased from +8% Poison Sting Slow to +12%

    Visage[edit]

    • Base magic resistance increased from 10% to 25%
    • Summon Familiars health rescaled from 400/550/700 to 500/600/700

    Warlock[edit]

    • Chaotic Offering Scepter now lands the 2nd Golem 0.4 seconds after the first, rather than both at the same time
    • Fatal Bonds count rescaled from 3/4/5/6 to 6
    • Fatal Bonds rescaled damage from 25% to 13/17/21/25
    • Level 25 Talent increased from +20 Golem Armor to +25

    Weaver[edit]

    • Now has 0.4 base mana regen
    • Base attack speed increased from 100 to 120

    Windranger[edit]

    • Reworked Scepter
      • Now adds 2 charges to Windrun and increases movement speed by 45%
    • Focus Fire cooldown reduced from 70 to 70/50/30
    • Level 10 Talent changed from +30% Windrun Slow to -2s Shackleshot Cooldown
    • Level 25 Talent changed from +35% Ministun Focus Fire to -20% Focus Fire Damage Reduction

    Winter Wyvern[edit]

    • Arctic Burn scepter mana cost per second reduced from 40 to 30

    Witch Doctor[edit]

    • Death Ward damage increased from 75/125/175 to 85/135/185

    Zeus[edit]

    • Now has 0.25 base mana regen
    • Attack point improved from 0.633 to 0.45
    • Level 10 Talent changed from +6 Armor to +3 Mana Regen
